titleStmt.title: An act for granting an additional duty on tobacco and for continuing unto His Majesty, an aid, or additional custom on several goods and merchandizes : and also for continuing the additional duty on beer and ale, and other liquors, till the twenty fifth day of December, one thousand, seaven hundred and two.
titleStmt.author: Ireland.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
